title: Introducing: The Casual Criminalist
description:
We would love to introduce you to The Casual Criminalist, a true crime podcast with a comedic edge, bringing you a couple of laughs along with horrific stories of murder death. The Casual Criminalist is a podcast from popular YouTuber Simon Whistler (Heather's favorite)! Enjoy!

https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-casual-criminalist/id1545318164
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
